long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful tool designed to enhance your presentations, making it easier to guide your audience's attention with precision. This virtual laser pointer simulates the effect of a laser pen on your screen, allowing you to highlight, circle, or point out specific areas in real time during your presentations. It's ideal for teachers, professionals, or anyone giving virtual or in-person presentations who needs to keep their audience focused.
